title: Seasons of Code Mentor
organization: Web and Coding Club, IIT Bombay
responsibilities: Mentored 10+ students on comprehensive Intrusion Detection Systems in collaboration with colleagues
Guided students to monitor network traffic and capture packets using the Scapy library
Taught students to analyze traffic patterns and identify suspicious behavior using Wireshark
Integrated machine learning techniques such as Decision Trees and K-Nearest Neighbors for detection in NIDS
impact: Successfully trained students to implement functional network intrusion detection systems using ML-enhanced approaches

title: Finsearch Mentor
responsibilities: Mentored 12+ students in assessing and enhancing Bond Valuation methods
Guided students on bond fundamentals, valuation methods, and key influencing factors
Addressed common limitations and conducted practical bond valuation assessments
impact: Improved students' ability to conduct thorough bond valuation analyses and critical financial assessments

title: Junior Engineer
responsibilities: Coordinated with team members on engineering projects and technical implementations
Communicated project requirements and updates effectively across teams
Applied technical skills to assist in the development and maintenance of engineering solutions
impact: Contributed to successful project execution and enhanced team coordination in on-site engineering tasks
